job.description: ltpgtThe National Security Agency in Texas is hiring for the following positions and many more at httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjoblistingsagencyNSA ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1168299ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166240ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1164116ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtNetwork Manager  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166238ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCyber Network Professional OffensiveDefensive  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166578ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtContact me if you determine NSA in Texas may be a great fit for your professional career especially if you already possess a CIFS  P If youve already applied for a position with us please let me know so I can connect some of the dots for you from a recruiter and hiring manager perspective Cheers Gregltpgt
